casebody.data:
Wednesday, January 17, 2001

MERIT DOCKET

00-1494. PPG Industries, Inc. v. Zaino.

Boai'd of Tax Appeals, No. 97-A-91. On joint motion to affirm decision and order of the Board of Tax Appeals. Motion granted.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
